introduction: Company Credits : Soyuzmultfilm SeeColor: ColorAspect Ratio: 1.33 : 1a 1984 short film directed by Ideya Garanina was inspired by the plays of Federico Garcia Lorca. Shelved by Soviet censors, the film was resurrected and recut after perestroika.This film can be watched in its entirety on the Masters Of Russian Animation DVD set - an extraordinary collection of Russia's most important animated short films by Russia's world renowned directors.
